product_name: Salomon SNS Pilot Carbon RS2 Skate Bindings
long_description: SNS Pilot Carbon RS2 Skate Bindings offer a high level of performance and are lightweight for racing and training. The close-to-the-ski design maximizes efficient transmission and good snow feel.
short_description: SNS Pilot Carbon RS2 Skate Bindings offer a high level of performance and are lightweight for racing and training. The close-to-the-ski design maximizes efficient transmission and good snow feel.
